main event: On May 15, 1963, a civilian observed a light in the sky at an elevation of 30 degrees that moved and then hovered before disappearing.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 12 minutes,The object traveled 5-10 degrees in 3-5 seconds before hovering motionless,The trajectory and speed were not characteristics of normal aircraft,The object suddenly disappeared without lighting effects being noted,Only one witness confirmed the sighting.
